Name: Repose' 1912
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Top with sparkling wine.
Review: Cognac with sharp balsamic notes and hints of chocolate, enlivened with champagne.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Simone Ditadi at Hilton Birmingham Metropole, Birmingham, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Repose' 1912 contains 121 calories
